page.title: 11FASHIONS
page.content: {Schoolwear GIRLS: Blouses are worn on the upper part of the body and skirts are worn from the waist to the knees. Dresses are worn from the shoulders to the knees. Jumpers and cardigans are worn over blouses. BOYS: Trousers are worn on the lower part of the body and on the legs. Jumpers are worn over shirts on the upper part of the body and on the arms. { Footwear GIRLS: Flat shoes and shoes with high heels can be worn on the feet. Shoes can be plain or decorated with laces, buckles or stitching. BOYS: Flat shoes are worn on the feet. They can be plain or decorated with laces and/or stitching.
